title: Supply Chain Execution Manager
content:
About GelatoGelato has built the world's largest and most global platform for on-demand production and fulfillment of customized products. Today, those products are part of huge markets, such as apparel, wall-art, drinkware, digitally printed books, greeting cards. In the future, the market opportunities are endless thanks to new technologies such as 3D printing. We support a new wave of e-commerce entrepreneurs to sell their creativity globally, with a more local and sustainable production. With local production and exact matching of supply and demand, there is no waste, and carbon emissions are reduced.We support a new wave of e-commerce entrepreneurs and the global shift towards local and more sustainable production.
We own no assets - we build the software that connects world-class production facilities all across the world. We have more than 100 production partners in 32 countries. In 72 hours we can reach more than 5 billion people with customized products in a smarter, faster, and greener way.What you will be doingWith a global network of production and distribution partners, supply chain network execution is at the core of how Gelato delivers value to its customers. You will have a chance to take on progressively challenging opportunities in the core of our elite operations network, designed to stretch your leadership and analytical capabilities.
Supply Chain Network Execution:


Ensure optimal allocation of volumes to Gelato’s global network of production partners balancing cost, speed, customer experience and other key metrics


Own key supply chain execution metrics and analyze root cause of deviations from target performance


Engage cross-functionally and drive continuous improvement of metrics


Partner with multiple teams and drive resolution of key operational issues


Who you areYou have a start-up mentality and a passion for drilling down to find the root cause of a problem. You are a customer-obsessed problem solver, eager to learn and improve. You are able to articulate complex concepts and are not afraid to challenge the status quo. No task is too small, but you can also see the bigger picture and help lead our operations support to evolve and scale. You lead by example and you love understanding data and identifying process improvements to benefit our partners and customers. In addition, we would like to see the following in your profile:


5+ years of leading supply chain network execution in a high growth start-up, retail or big tech environment


Experience in retail, supply chain, logistics, or eCommerce; with a strong and demonstrable interest in driving operational strategy and execution for a high growth business


Strong analytical experience and hands on in operating with large data sets to generate insight and actionable conclusions


Proven track record of leadership, taking ownership and driving results


Thrives in a high growth, entrepreneurial, and ambiguous environment

What it’s like to work at GelatoWe are a customer-obsessed team with the ambition to change the world by connecting technology to the printing industry and making it much more sustainable. Everyone who joins our team must feel genuinely intrigued and motivated by our mission. We expect a lot. We are a driven team with big goals, so we seek individuals who are genuinely passionate about their work and possess an entrepreneurial spirit. Our culture is unique and we live by our values, so it's worth learning more about our culture and how we work before presenting your application.
